name: The Glory of Heracles IV: Gift from the Gods
name_original: The Glory of Heracles IV: Gift from the Gods
description: Heracles no Eikou IV: Kamigami Kara no Okurimono (イラクレスの栄光　神々からの贈り物, Glory of Heracles IV: Gift from the Gods ) is a RPG video game published by Data East released on October 21st, 1994 for the SNES.
